website_summaries.verdict: This popular permanent hair color by a top name in beauty has been a best-seller for years for good reasons – it produces natural-looking, attractive color for a fraction of the price of others in its class.
pros: Made without ammonia, so it doesn't smell overwhelming when you apply it
Formula has been revamped to include keratin and silk amino acid
One of the more affordable permanent hair colors on the market today
cons: Not the best choice for making drastic changes, such as brunette to blond
Some shades tend to fade faster than others
Won't color well for all users with very gray hair

customer_reviews.title: Gave my hair life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yesss gave me the pop of color I was looking for. Will be buying AGAIN! Easy to use, first timers can use it!
customer_reviews.author: cook

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took a chance on this!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence, get it!! I can’t say much about longevity just yet but with two extra bottles I will freshen it up when I need to. I have paid stylists for years and with twins at home I haven’t had the time/energy to go to salon and now don’t want to spend the $150 it costs to color and cut it each time I go. The $9 I spent is well worth the risk and I am happy with the results. It looks far more natural than anything I have done in recent years.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never go back to the salon
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who has refused her entire life to dye her hair at home. I spend $1200 a year dying my hair at the salon. This one box of color was under $3 and I’m in love. I am never going back to the salon and I will continue to buy this hair color. This color will cost me $34 per year. The results speak for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: aliciareadsNYA

customer_reviews.title: My go to hair color!
customer_reviews.text: I try other colors and brands as I color my own hair every 4-6 weeks. I have stubborn grays. I have people stop me and compliment my hair color. Recently had a co worker stop and actually ask to know what I use. I buy this with my subscribe and save and left a bottle on her desk because she loves it so much too. This color compliments my fair skin and works for any season. It's warm with a hint of red. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this hair dye for ten years!
customer_reviews.text: the girl on the box for medium auburn #42 is like a family member at this point. I love this stuff. great natural color- no one except for my husband and family knows I'm not a natural redhead. the conditioner smells amazing and makes your hair super soft. the color is decently long lasting and I usually touch up every 3-4 weeks. the gloves that come with it are garbage but who cares? it's like $3 a box. it's the cheapest hair dye on the market but I prefer it to more pricy brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic color
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many over the counter hair dyes from Faria to John Freida. This hair color is the best I've ever used. My mom's friend gave her a box of Dark Soft Brown and I applied it to her mostly gray hair. Well, to my surprise it covered her gray and added a beautiful shine. I fell in love with the shade, purchased a box and colored my hair two hours ago. All I can say is Revlon Colorstay is the perfect shade and grays..... what grays?! I can't speak for the other shades available but this rich multi dimensional shade is better than most salon formulas.
customer_reviews.author: BostonTech

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give reviews but I was very pleased with this. I got the Medium Brown. It covered my grays, made my hair shiny, and didn’t smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this Ash Blonde color on me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this color on me! It helps to cover my gray hair. It compliments me!
customer_reviews.author: Trapdap2

customer_reviews.title: Please don't cut or dye your hair if anything emotional/remotely stressful is happening in your life
customer_reviews.text: I was having a breakdown and decided to chop all my hair off and bleach it orange. This fixed the color aspect at least.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBeemz

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL color
customer_reviews.text: the most perfect light auburn color ever! so excited to be back to my natural red color!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Selia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing long lasting grey coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand and color for years and I absolutely love it. I have thick natural curly hair and over 50 % grey.....so my hair tends to be resistant to color but this works amazingly. I couldn't be more pease with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Mama Bear got new hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair came out a dark cherry which I love! I was really hoping for more of a brighter red, but I still really like this color. Revlon has always been my go-to dye simply because the conditioner is AMAZING!! Idek what color my hair was before. All I know that it was a faded box dye from Revlon. I must say it faded beautifully though 😂
customer_reviews.author: Velasquez_3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand and this color for sometime now. It doesn’t stink up your house but will stain whatever you get it in that it’s not supposed. The color is rich and makes my hair so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bouet

customer_reviews.title: Dark Ash Blonde
customer_reviews.text: Covered up all the brassy tones in my hair. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shera ♡

customer_reviews.title: Get the three pack
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I’m so surprised with how much this lifted with just two boxes my roots were sooo dark. Dark brown. It lifted them to this color, not as light as the rest of my hair but with the last box i know it’ll be the same. Amazing and such a great price. I got the natural light blonde. Def recommend this product! Same price for a three pack as for one box of another kind that might not cover all your hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly mathews

customer_reviews.title: Love this colour! Great value too.
customer_reviews.text: Great and gentle. I have a very sensitive scalp and I'm sensitive to heavy perfume. This stuff is my go-to colour of choice. Covers all my greys and blends well.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBee04

customer_reviews.title: Love the Light Ash Brown
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has no ammonia. Sells for a low price and the color light ash brown is very pretty. My hair is dark brown and grayish, other medium brown hair color makes my hair look too dark. Golden brown didn't look good either. This shade looks almost natural, I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got the natural blue black and it is perfect. It has a nice little tiny of blue to it. Not overwhelmingly blue. My only problem is it gets under your nails for about the week after you put it in. Other than that it's really a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Burned my scalp in several places.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hair color for 25 years. However, this was the first time I purchased from Amazon. I think this may have been an old product as it burned my scalp around my hairline and several places front and back. Buyer beware, this is extremely uncomfortable and I wouldn't want it to happen to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Carry

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you're mostly gray
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product and it did not cover my gray very well or last long. It might be a wonderful product if you're less than 50% gray, but not if you're more than that.
customer_reviews.author: skylightning

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand before to lighten my hair instead of using a harsh bleach. This did nothing. Not even a slight change in tone, and I left it on longer than it said to just to see if it could lighten my hair at all. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT cover Grey hair
customer_reviews.text: I left this on for 15 minutes more than suggested just to make sure it would cover my grey hair sprouting from my scalp. DOES NOT COVER. Waste of money, don't buy if you are trying to conceal grey hair!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolina

customer_reviews.title: Dyed my hair light brown NOT medium blonde
customer_reviews.text: Color was easy to use and didn’t smell bad, BUT it did not make my hair blonde. I started out having dark blonde/light brown hair with grown out blonde highlights. This dye actually made my hair darker. Not what I was going for and not what was depicted on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think that this is the original one that you buy in stores, because this 1 was super dry and made my hair feel really brittle!! It also comes with more in the bottle when I buy it from the store... usually 1 bottle is good for my whole head, but with these, 1 bottle wasn't enough. Probably not gonna buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: It will not damage your hair.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for years. I have dark blonde hair with a few grays and it makes my hair golden blonde without damaging my hair. I give it 3 stars because the picture is misleading and it probably won’t make your hair platinum like the box shows. I use this as a base and get a high lighter kit to make it look more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ace

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BRAND!
customer_reviews.text: Not even the same color! Turned my medium brown hair jet black I wanted dark brown!!!! I gave this brand a second chance and I've learned my lesson!! This photo was taken after washing it for the 3rd time to try and get some color out.. didn't work! (Hair was slightly damp)
customer_reviews.author: Chabalabdingdawngh

customer_reviews.title: Expired & old
customer_reviews.text: Don't even bother, these are old, expired, and do not work. I usually buy this at a local store, took a chance here, complete waste of time & money.
customer_reviews.author: 6catds

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the color in the box was swapped, but this actually darkened my hair to a dark ash blonde. My hair was a light reddish blonde before.
customer_reviews.author: D. Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Even though it says “ash” which is supposed to reduce brasiness, my roots are still a little orange tinted. So I was dissaponted, but overall decent color.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other hair colors and they were awful. After trying this, I was very pleased. Went a color lighter and it was a perfect blonde for me. 100% gray coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: BEST COLORS ON EARTH!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I accidentally overdue my blonde highlights, this med & light ash brown covers up the mistakes perfectly. You don't have to mix up a whole box, just follow measurements for the test directions. Where else can you get a believable dye job for pennies? =)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Baja

customer_reviews.title: TRIED AND TRUE!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried various expensive hair coloring products; have had it done professionally, also. Have come to the conclusion that Revlon's Colorsilk is just as good as the more expensive and salon coloring products. It leaves my hair soft, the color lasts and it is dark brown, as it states. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rosa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than grease
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether to like this product or hate it because.. Those who have left a review saying this doesn't covers gray, i don't know what kind of hair grows on your head because this dye not only covers my gray, i tried dying my hair brown after 2 weeks and it still stays like a bitch. I might have to go to a professional salon to fix my hair.. Fml
customer_reviews.author: Souma

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DARK!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I will give it two stars for durability. I dyed my hair a week and a half ago and even with shampooing daily with harsh shampoos, the color is still lasting. Unfortunately, the color is so dark that I look goth instead of burgundy. Great product if you want black hair that may eventually fade to a hint of burgundy, but definitely not the color that is advertised
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: So I only ever colour my hair at the salon, never do box bye but given the recent circumstances, I had to fix my roots at home. Every time i used box dye in the past, I ended up with blotchy, darkened, brassy, DIY looking hair. I’m genuinely amazed by how well this product worked! It covered my roots perfectly, every bit of grey is coloured, the length looks even and didn’t darken at all! Quite possibly the best quality drugstore dye I’ve ever come across, a big plus that it didn’t stink and is easily removable from the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would lighten my hair enough so I could dye it blue. IT DID ABSOLUTELY NOTHING FOR MY HAIR. It didn’t lighten it even a little. This was pointless for me. It didn’t even lighten my roots. I put the product in and left for 30min it says to leave for 25 and then put up with my hair tie and the hair on the hair tie didn’t even change color. This was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: ~Easy and inexpensive - been using Revlon colorsilk for 10+ years now~~
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Revlon colorsilk for more than ten years with no problems. Since it's so inexpensive and only adds half an hour to normal shampooing I touch up every 3 weeks. I used to wait a month or so but now that I have more grey coming in my roots are more obvious. I am not at the stage where I can go grey completely - too much salt and pepper still. But I did switch my regular shade from Light Golden Brown to Dark Blonde a month or so ago since a lighter shade makes the grey roots less obvious. Dark Blonde gives me about one shade lighter than the brown did.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Not A Lightener! But great for brassiness
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you already have blonde hair before using this. It does not have lightening capabilities, it is best for blonde root touch up. It will make hair more vibrant if it has fades though! I recommend using this if your hair is a bit on the brassy side.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Longest Lasting Box Dye On The Market
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying my hair most of my life, and I've tried pretty much every product out there. I've dyed black for at least 10 years and I have to say, ColorSilk is by far the longest-lasting brand I've encountered. Black is touchy because it can fade pretty quickly, and a LOT of the pricier brands wash out super quickly. This does not go anywhere. All I have to do is touch up my roots at this point, I only refresh all the color maybe once or twice a year. If you're dying black, I can say with confidence that ColorSilk is the most color-fast, and it even thoroughly covers those pesky silver hairs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fried my hair
customer_reviews.text: This color fried my hair. Doesn't last and has a strong red cast once it wears off. I hate this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Palmer

customer_reviews.title: just loved it! easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I only color my hair to cover my stubborn white-to-gray hair. I have dark brown hair naturally and I always wanted to have a reddish hair. Then I found this! I just love the red color effect on my dark brown hair. My husband loves how easy to apply this (yeah, he's the one applying it 😅).
customer_reviews.author: iammyx

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good product
customer_reviews.text: This was so inexpensive I decided to give it a try to cover the few gray hairs I have sprung (noooooooooo!!!!) LOL... my hair is very thick and coarse, so I had to leave it in for about an hour before the color darkened. I have exceptionally thick and rather long hair, so the bottle only covered about 1/6th of my hair, but for someone with average thickness, I think it might fully cover all hair if its shoulder-length or shorter. Overall, I'd recommend it for touching-up roots or to covering a few grays.
customer_reviews.author: JC Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my hair - BEWARE of this junk
customer_reviews.text: My hair is destroyed from this stuff. I've been bleaching/dyeing my hair for 25 years and have never had this kind of damage. Put this on my completely virgin hair, and it broke off tons of my hair. Around my hairline, my hair is broken and now about 3-4 inches long, compared to the rest of my hair that is down my back. I wouldn't put this on my worst enemy's hair. Please beware and try something else. Black hair dye should never damage your hair more than bleaching it to platinum does. I am so, so angry beyond belief.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Your hair will look like it was done at a salon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best hair color ever! I look like I have been to a high quality salon. After years of going to the salon and paying hundreds of dollars this does a better job hands down! People have said to me wow your hair looks great! What salon are you going to. Remember use a purple shampoo and conditioner weekly to keep it looking salon fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not use it, made my hair fall.... during quarentine I've been using this crappy hair color and now you can see missing hair in the area where I apply it on my grays
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this color for many years. It is a good value and easy to use. As other reviews have mentioned, you need to look on the panel showing the before hair color and the resulting color. My hair is naturally light red but as I have gotten older, I have white (not gray) areas. I blend light auburn with medium auburn and apply to the white areas and then finish all over with light auburn. I end up with an even color I am very happy with!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: The color of the paint is significantly lighter than my natural hair color and I was afraid of getting orange hair. Thankfully, that was not the case. -Easy to use (simple, easy to follow instructions) -Doesn’t need a brush for application -Didn’t damage my hair (but I’ve also been careful to put coconut and olive oil weekly). I’ve been maintaining the beautiful color alternating between purple shampoo and purple mask.
customer_reviews.author: lia88

customer_reviews.title: Great price and minimal damage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair color, I have used it in the past when I went red. This time I decided to go for 33 Dark Soft Brown to cover up some accidental red and it worked beautifully! I'm really happy with it! Very easy to apply, little to no damage, and i don't think the scent is bad at all! I can't really speak to the longevity of this particular color since this is the first time I have used it and I only dyed my hair yesterday. I will say that when I use the red color it was beautiful but I felt the need to recolor every 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: MIssing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The product went on easily enough. But the Brown-Black color was more black than brown - so kind of a disappointing matte black look. I don't now yet how long it will last as I only did my hair about a week ago. The most irritating thing though is that the product came without gloves! Gloves are listed in the box insert as being included, but they were not. Instead I got product all over my hands, and my nails are dyed brownish . Despite constant hand washing (esp with Covid 19) it seems the color will remain on my nails as long as the color remains on my head. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Porgy

customer_reviews.title: In Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and the hair color worked fine. That is until a day later i started to get itchy on my scalp. And then it worsened. I currently have blisters, burns, sores and rashes across my chest, back, face and scalp. And when I didn’t think it could get any worse, my face and ears are swelling and my left eye is swollen. I’m miserable and don’t recommend buying this product from amazon. I’ve used this hair dye before just never from amazon so i’m gonna guess that’s why I am breaking out now. Three bottles of hair dye (i have EXTREMELY thick hair) has costed me 2 ER visits.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Denton

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy hair color
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product left my hair a little darker then planned but overall nice color easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great gray coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black , N1, and love it. It covered all my grays and it is very shiny and lively. Most of the blacks make your hair dull and dry but it didn’t have any negative effect on my hair. Just to be careful when applying because somehow it is impossible to remove stains from some surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Bazabib

customer_reviews.title: Still searching for box dye that will actually come out ash
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't bad at all but still had orange tones. I think all box dyes would give me orange hair!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shade for my complexion
customer_reviews.text: I am very very pleased with this product. I naturally have dark brown to near black hair. I lightened it over the course of a month to pale yellow (the 2-image collage shows this process). Save for a few steaks to frame my face, I used this dark ash blonde to color over the lightest I could achieve and I think the results are beautiful. I included images of my hair wet right after coloring and one after my hair was curled/styled.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenyx

customer_reviews.title: Smell is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this brand before, so I don’t know what’s wrong, but this smelled terrible to me. I don’t mean it has a particularly harsh chemical smell, but that the smell itself is like some sort of gross smell that gave me the feeling that I had soap in my mouth (it made me gag—I could only keep it on for ten minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Intellectual Romantic

customer_reviews.title: My hair is DARKER instead of being blonde!
customer_reviews.text: Never buying again. I had dirty blonde hair to begin with, so this should according to the box lighten my hair up. This actually made my hair DARKER. It’s pretty much a light brunette color. Absolutely not even close to the color on the box. It also made my roots an orange hue. Do not waste you’re time and money, and HAIR on this product. I bought and used the medium ash blonde color.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and i need to dye my hair every two weeks so I am loving the bargain
customer_reviews.author: Organizer

customer_reviews.title: For orange bleached hair
customer_reviews.text: Bleached hair at home. My hair was black but I'm a natural blonde. My hair turned bright yellow and orange this dark ashe blonde fixed it! I'm in love! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Baisden

customer_reviews.title: Product is kind to my hair. It gives me ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is kind to my hair. It gives me the exact color that I wanted: my original color before starting to go gray. Very simple to use. Consistent package to package.
customer_reviews.author: Dona B. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product and particular color all the time, from various vendors and apply every 6 weeks or so. The color from these was a bit odd, and not the results I usely get. Boxes were very "beat up" - looked lke they had fallen off the back of a truck and run over, frankly. Formulation/product too old? Could not find an expiration date...
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color and no bad odors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color because it’s as close to my natural color as I can find. It’s a darkish blonde with golden highlights but they’re very mild...nothing crazy. I like that this fades after washing because it starts off darker than my color but then after a few washes it becomes more golden. I color my hair about every 4 weeks due to greys at the hairline. This covers them easily! And then scent is good and not strong at all. I’m super sensitive and am not irritated or bothered by this color like other brands I’ve tried. And the price it’s terrific!! It also come with a conditioner that helps make my hair silky smooth. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: VonWong

customer_reviews.title: Good solid red
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a redhead for about 15 or 16 years at this point and have had it colored by salon colorists and box colors alike. While I love getting my hair done by pros, it hasn’t been in my budget for the past while so I go in and get my hair trimmed but color my hair myself. This dye works really well and I feel the color stays vibrant longer than a lot of other box reds. The smell also isn’t overwhelming, and the conditioner that comes with the color is great for my naturally coarse and wavy hair. I’d recommend giving this a shot, the price is right😊
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using semi-permanent dyes for a few years now as my greys have progressively come in. I was reluctant to go to a salon to get permanent dye, because of the obvious grow out line (and the salon is so expensive to go too often). I bought this during the COVID pandemic and I wish I’d done it sooner! It does have a grow out line, as expected, but at this price I can touch up my roots as often as I want. Very happy with this product and how affordable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great for brows 🙃😂
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dye just for my eye brows and it's done amazing no burning or itching nothing. It's perfect my eyebrows are blonde so almost invisible so I've been using this on them and it last so long and it's the perfect color. I just mix a lil of the color and a lil of the developer in a lil sauce container then apply it like brow gel then rinse it off after 15mins ❤ 1st picture is after I applied it before I rinced it off and after
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Perry

customer_reviews.title: Dark ash blonde
customer_reviews.text: I have virgin hair. I purchased the Dark ash blonde and ultra light ash blonde. I tried dying the underlayer of my hair the dark ash blonde but it didn’t do anything at all. I havnt tried the ultra blonde yet. I checked the boxes, they’re not expired. And given that there is absolutely no previous dyes in my hair, I have no idea why the dark ash didn’t work. I’ll still try the ultra light ash blonde and review it at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting color with shine
customer_reviews.text: I like the product..came fast shipping will order again I love this product i use it to dye my real hair and my kinky straight bundles..and im wearing. The dubai lashes by "valesha"on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: exotic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not light gold It makes my hair like black And it burned my headś skin I ask you don’t buy it to be healthy It’s cheap price but bothering you a lot I had much pain for severalllll hours
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair color
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for 3 boxes of hair color, less than 3 bucks a box for a brand and color I absolutely love. The color brown black #20 is a perfect almost black but not quite great shade. Perfect color and price, this can't be beat!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Conicki

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if a 2$ hair dye would really work. But it went great. My hair was a bleach color, a darkish bleach. It turned it bright red. It did fade some after the first wash. But still kept the color in. If you only wash your hair once to twice a week then one box is enough. But if you wash your hair everyday then I suggest two boxes. Really bright, beautiful. Gives a Ariel look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Same product colors and quality for decades
customer_reviews.text: Great hair color for at home touch ups or when money is tight! I've been using this for a decade or more. Consist product. The color is always darker than the box, as with all drug-store boxed hair color. I am between dark blonde and light brown. I find the gap too wide and wish there were a color or two in between. If you have never colored at home I don't recommend buying online. I will continue to use this hair color and I am happy to do it during the COVID-19 salon closures. If you know your color in THIS product, not other Revlon color sub-brands, then by all means, save money and buy here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Doobzie

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order Love the prize love the product I only use it to do my roots And it works out find since I only do my roots every month and a half my hair doesn’t get damage, plus I put hair conditioning oil and rap it in aluminum foil half way of my hair and then I dye it so it my hair is getting condition and getting dye at the same time That’s just a little tip on the best way to dye your hair
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia

customer_reviews.title: Natural red
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite natural red hair color! I get so many complaints on the color. Great value for the price point. Color gradually fades out still looking natural. Needs a better conditioner in the box! Went to 3 Walmart's, 2 target's looking for this color with no luck. Super excited to find it on Amazon going to stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HAIR RAISING!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy included. But for price, it delivers a bang. Beautiful rich color, covers stubborn grays. I have long hair. 1 box is just about pushing the root coverage and ends. I'd pay more for more product included. Few times a year I need 2 boxes. Nothing to sweat about. The scent isn't too bad. But I've yet to smell a great hair color dye. Comes with a small packet of really nice conditioner... i mix it with my own conditioner since the packet won't cover my ends.
customer_reviews.author: SweetSomebody

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT buy again  :-( - 04 Ultra Light Natural Blonde
customer_reviews.text: Awful smell, and I had a horrible ALLERGIC reaction to it and Will NOT buy again :-( - 04 Ultra Light Natural Blonde. I have used Revlon hair color for over 20 years. I never had a problem until I got the 04 Ultra Light Natural Blonde. It did NOT cover my gray roots at all, it actually made my gray roots more WHITE. It turned the rest of my hair a yellow blond. So, I still need to find a blond color that will cover my gray roots and make the rest of my hair blend in with a nice blond color. The worst part was the smell, the burn, and the allergic reation to this specific hair color.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because another dye that I ordered was not great, this dye holds very well. After dying my hair, I’ve gone swimming on multiple occasions and it’s still lasting really well, other dyed I’ve used would’ve faded already. Plus it’s great for its value!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: This has been my favorite color for ev er!
customer_reviews.text: Last couple of years, I haven't been able to find this color in stores. Very excited found it in bulk. Great price! I usually need 2 boxes at a time since I have really long hair. Perfect long lasting color. This color is nice because it doesn't murder your shower when you rinse it out either. LOVE it! The conditioner that comes with it is wonderful and makes my hair feel silky.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I did read some reviews that said it washed right out. I left it in about 15 minutes longer. My hair looks better than when I go to the hairdresser’s!!! And it was much cheaper too!! I have REALLY stubborn white roots, very obvious around the face area. I think women having blond hair get away with not as many dye jobs as women with much darker hair. I say that because my friends who are blond tell me. It’s not the case with medium or dark brown or black hair. I will continue to use this product. Buy without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: DCat

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the color dark mahogany brown. My hair is naturally a medium brown. Typically, dark brown dyes come out almost black when I use them and fade to a dark brown after a few washes. This one came out dark brown/true to color right away and faded out nearly 100% within 4 washes or so. So I’d say poor color payoff. The pros are that this is super cheap and affordable, and seems to be a non commitment hair color option if that’s what you’re seeking. The con, obviously, is that it doesn’t last. I may try other shades from this line and see how they perform.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Blackest Black + Little Fading
customer_reviews.text: I'm naturally a brunette with copper tones, and my plans for this purchase of 3 boxes of black was to keep up on my ever growing roots in an inexpensive fashion. It's been over a week and I have noticed no fading and very little wash out as well. I'd also like to add that this hair dye was very easy to blend with my gradation/ombre look of black to teal to purple. I'd order again if I need more black any time soon!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My OG favorite
customer_reviews.text: Missed my black hair I had bought a 10 dollar box dye after having it red and washed off in a week so mad I knew this hair due was my ride or die because my hair is still black after 3 weeks .... so I’ll be sticking with this hair dye Guarantee it for sure I always get the black and blue since it makes my hair look shinier ❤️
customer_reviews.author: pinksessh ❤

customer_reviews.title: Great color, even better price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bright Auburn. The first photo is before(reddish brown). I did a color test, and saw that I wasn't going to get the color I wanted without lightening it first. After lightening it to a orange color, I washed, rinsed and let it air dry before applying the Bright Auburn. I definitely love this color. I doesn't bleed inthe shower. I must note that I also use once a week, Clenditioner in Copper color, in order to keep my color vibrant in between color retouches.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blair

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought burgundy & It’s holding up ok , but only on the ends of my hair. It’s been a couple of months now but After about a week my roots were right back to my original color. my hair ( my whole head) usually holds any type of dye for a very long time except this one. It bleeds when i wash or wet it & it stained my hands when I styled my hair so I have to wear gloves just to do it which is annoying. Good thing that I only paid $2 for it. Maybe that’s why it was so cheap cuz it’s kind of a poor quality. I’ll be going back to using splat
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dye at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this hair dye because it does not turn my hair too dark like almost every other brand that I have tried. It is also a great price and does not have an overpowering smell like some other hair dyes do.
customer_reviews.author: KEREN C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price
customer_reviews.text: You really can’t beat the price. I always bought this exact box of dye from the local drug stores, but the rite aid by my apartment has gone as far as to raise it to $8 per box. My hair grows really fast, and is naturally blonde, so I have to dye it frequently, making this one of my most frequent purchases on amazon. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K. Karabin Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I've used it for years now and I'm so happy that I can buy it here for so much cheaper then the store I get 3 times the product for the same price, I only wish it came with a bit more conditioner, the smell isnt like most dyes where its important to breathe and my hair feels and smells amazing for days after and in the past its saved my hair from the dryness of to many days in the pool, plus my hair doesnt become a knotted mess in the process of dying which is really good as I have fine hair and it's on the thin side.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great price just not for my hair
customer_reviews.text: The color doesn't last long in my hair and doesn't really cover up my gray that well I'm sure it might work great for somebody else's hair just don't know if I'll buy it again
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Same shade Revlon versus L’Oreal what a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually take the time to write reviews but I wanted to this time in case it’s helpful to others. I don’t know why I kept trying to use L’Oreal never got good results doesn’t cover gray well, the colors don’t turn out like they’re shown, Doesn’t leave hair healthy. I tried dark ash blonde L’Oreal didn’t cover it didn’t hardly do anything. I was about to give up with that shade but I thought I would give Revlon a try. What a difference! It’s a lot cheaper than L’Oreal so I was afraid to use it but Revlon is not only a great financial deal but the grey coverage is excellent and I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color 04 Ultra Light Blonde - Perfect Hair Match
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color match for my hair. Does a great job of blending. I have white and natural blonde. Makes the hair look completely balanced. Use this once a year which is self-explanatory how great this perm is.
customer_reviews.author: Steppin' Time

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This ash blond shade was basically grey. I needed to follow it the next day with an actual BLOND shade to cover the grey.
customer_reviews.author: Gullsflyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cool winter complexions
customer_reviews.text: The shade 40 medium ash brown rinses out purple, which is the product base I am supposed be using. For some reason, shade 40 is rarely sold in stores, which makes no sense to me. According to multiple internet sites, people with cool / winter complexions are the most common in the world of all of the Color Me Beautiful seasons. I guess this explains why so many people have reddish, orange, and gold undertones in their dyed hair!
customer_reviews.author: Pat B Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever attempt to dye my own hair and i was amazed at how easy this product was to use, how gorgeous my hair turned out and it even feels better than it did before I dyed it! Loved the conditioner that came with it! Color was as described. Delivery time was fast! Will use again when the grays start to show.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Landress

customer_reviews.title: Best natural black hairdye
customer_reviews.text: I have natural black hair, but living in Florida the sun always lightens my hair, so I like to touch it up with black hair dye. I've used nearly every dye under the sun and could never find a natural looking black. All other hairdyes left me looking blocky and way too dark for a few days after dying (I'd have to wash my hair about 5 times to wash some dye out to get a natural look) and I always assumed that was the case with all dyes. Turns out, nope! Those dyes just sucked. This one gets you to the perfect, natural black color immediately with no extra steps! This will be my go-to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Crimé

customer_reviews.title: Stay With Revlon!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was 3 different tones from light ,med and dark. This not only smelled great, I didn't have to use vaseline to make sure my skin wasn't dyed too.I just took a wet tissue with a squirt of hand soap on it and wiped off any extra. Easy peasy. My hair turned out an even deep burgandy. Very pretty and I received compliments already. I would recommend this highly. I've been a Revlon user for many years. I was only unhappy when I tried another more expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value as it's hard for me to find this color all the time. I like to stock up with at least 3-4 boxes so this purchase is fantastic for my needs. They come sealed in 3's and all boxes were in good shape and not some warehouse leftovers. Highly recommend you look for your specific shade. This value can't be beat even without a manufacturers lousy 50 cent coupon.
customer_reviews.author: Pattycakes1955

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I have natural black hair and hard to get hair color on and this is the only brand gets me the colors I want. It smells ok. I am very happy with the product!!! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lalaland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with a different shade to get the color I want. It is easy to use. Just wish they would ship items in one box instead of each Revlon box in a separate box. Box it is sent in can hold two Revlon boxes, but no matter how many boxes I order and make the request to ship in less boxes, each Revlon box is sent in a separate box. Very wasteful and time-consuming to open and prepare for recycling. Otherwise, this is a great hair rinse.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: far From a “medium” brown
customer_reviews.text: This medium brown is more like a very light ash brown. That isn’t necessarily bad but the customer should be aware
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Revlon colorsick hair color has NO AMMONIA, so it is gentle for every 4 weeks coloring. The color is VIBRANT! It smells pleasant as well and extremely easy to apply in minutes. This hair color is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! Amazon shipped it rapidly and made me so happy during the COVID19 quarantine. Thank you so much Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Good product, pics attached
customer_reviews.text: I have brown hair, attached are the after pictures dying with Revlon Color Silk dark ash blonde number#6 as a base before I put highlights. I used purple shampoo (kept only one minute 📌) so it took reddish/chestnut tones away. I think the color is more settled this way and looking more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: 1:1 ratio colorsilk 75 warm golden blonde + colorsilk 45 bright auburn
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t dye my hair for 6 months. Last time I used colorsilk buttercream 59CC intense vivid copper. It was out of stock so I decided to experiment. I was worried the 45 bright auburn would be too pink so I added the 75 warm golden blonde. It came out a perfect medium copper. The formula is a bit runny but it didn’t smell harsh and it saturated my hair well. I was also surprised when I washed it out there was hardly any bleeding. I hope this review helps my fellow colorists!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kate

product_meta.title: Revlon Colorsilk Beautiful Color, Permanent Hair Dye with Keratin, 100% Gray Coverage, Ammonia Free, 31 Dark Auburn
product_meta.description:
Size:Single Pack| Color:Dark Auburn

ColorSilk Beautiful Color™ is the #1 brand in the USA*. The ammonia-free hair color delivers 100% gray coverage. Achieve rich, long lasting hair color and a radiant shine at home. Revlon’s 3D Color Gel Technology™ delivers natural looking, multi-tonal color from root to tip providing definition and boosting your hair’s dimension. Hair is left feeling silky, shiny and healthy, and in better condition than before coloration.

Revlon's calculations based on Nielsen ScanTrack unit sales data for U.S. Hair color category last 52 weeks ending 6/29/2019 across xAOC and Nielsen U.S. panel data FY 2018.
feature_bullets: Permanent at-home hair dye, co-developed with salon experts
Revlon 3D Color Gel Technology delivers rich, natural-looking, multi-tonal color from root to tip
Enriched with Keratin and Silk Amino Acid

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
